welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shinkai, Japan! Embrace the city's serene beauty, rich history, and famous cherry blossoms, and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore this charming destination to the fullest.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yokota AFB Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.
